data.name: The Evidence Demo
data.detailed_description:
In The Evidence you'll take over the role of a detective who has to search for evidence at crime scenes and identify the possible murderer. You won't have many tools to choose from, but your mind will be by far the most powerful.

Investigate crime scenes & find evidence



Look closely at each crime scene and analyze every piece of evidence you find. There are no hints... you have to come up with the solution yourself. With your in-game notebook, you can write down everything that seems important to you, so you don't lose track.

Find the connection and solve the case



Connect the evidence and try to reconstruct the case. Some murderers try to hide evidence from you. Use the flashlight to see even in the darkest corners of the scene.

Interaction with many objects



You can interact with many objects inside the scenes. But be aware: Not every object is also evidence, don't get misled. Listen to your gut feeling to distinguish the relevant objects from the others.

data.short_description: In The Evidence you'll take over the role of a detective who has to search for evidence at crime scenes and identify the possible murderer. Check out the evidence, find the connections and solve the case!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: WIndows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-4160 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX660 (or AMD equivalent)
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
